import { useState } from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import Header from "../header/Header"; import MypageSideBar from "./MypageSideBar"; import styles from "./css/MyInfo.module.css"; export default function MyInfo() { const [emailOption, setEmailOption] = useState(''); const HandleEmailChange = (e) => { setEmailOption(e.target.value); }; return (
